title: Looking for DUO partner Silver+

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hey all currently looking for someone to duo with in the ranks of Silver. 
I am Currently Silver 2 and looking to climb. 
I can fill all roles but tend to lean towards ADC/TOP/MID. I dont mind having to fill a role that helps you or visa versa :) 

Leave your IGN here and a little about yourself and ill get back to you :)

replies.body:
IGN: span

I can fill just about any role, play a very team effective strategy and have a pretty massive champ pool.
i got to g5 last season but im currently in silver and looking to get back into gold asap.
I play all night on mondays and wednesdays, and can fill in other days where needed.

Hello,
IGN: viperblits

I've played league since the end of season 3. 
At the moment I'm hovering around mid silver. (Silver IV atm).
I am a dedicated Jungle main but I can play ADC and Support reasonably well.
Champions:
Jungle: {{champion:254}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:59}} 
ADC: {{champion:236}} 
Support: {{champion:89}} {{champion:267}} 

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/507691

Schedule:
Monday -  Wed: 5pm - 8pm
Thur:  No League
Fri :  5pm - Very late
Sat: 10am - Very Late (Some exceptions may apply)
Sunday: 10am - Afternoon, 6pm - 9pm (Some exceptions may apply).
Message me on league for my Skype contact.

I play a passive/supportive jungle play style and I am always looking for new friends to camp and get super fed. 

Regards,
Viper

Hey, 
ign: TheGerm8
I have played league for a few years, and battled through the ranked queues for most of them. I generally play MID/ADC/SUPP, i can play top lane too if needed, my jungle play isn't great but i can improve if your willing to give some constructive feedback. 
I can tell you what champs a play at a later date, atm meta is king so ill probably be playing towards that.
I'm currently silver 1 and want to head into gold division and beyond.
Every good duo has good chemistry, if you can bring some good chemistry,  i can cook that shit up better than Walter White!
msg me if you need more info, XD

IGN John Cleese,  i can play every role to a fair extent but I spend most games supporting just because nobody else wants to. In support i play mainly characters that do well being both aggressive or defensive, with preference on being aggressive. My current support roster in order of preference is {{champion:143}} , {{champion:26}} , {{champion:117}}  and {{champion:79}}
